course_title: Studies in Major Figures: Spike Lee
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 11 / Seats Avail: 3Waitlist Total: 0
course_description: An intensive, in-depth study of the work of a recognized major figure in world cinema in the class of Griffith, Dreyer, Ford, Renoir, Welles, Ophuls, Kurosawa, Godard, Antonioni, Hitchcock, or Scorscese. Weekly screenings required.
prerequisites: FILM 102 and (FILM 201 or FILM 202 or FILM 203 or FILM 204) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 2982, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:20a-12:35p, Instructor: B. Smith-Shomade, Status: Open
